title: Investment Platform UX
subtitle: Usability assessment and optimization
summary: Comprehensive UX audit of investment platform, identifying usability issues and providing actionable recommendations to improve user experience.
process: Conducted heuristic evaluation using Nielsen's 10 principles to identify obvious usability issues.
Ran moderated user testing sessions with 12 participants across 3 user personas.
Performed competitive analysis of 5 leading investment platforms.
Prioritized recommendations based on impact vs. effort matrix and delivered actionable roadmap.
